name: Add Game

name: 1v1.lol

name: 1v1 space
desc: Embark a thrilling adventure through the cosmos, navigating through galaxies, and engaging in intense space combat with an AI opponent.
Merge numbers to create 2048!

name: 99 Balls
desc: 99 Balls is a fast-paced, addictive game where you must avoid the walls and collect as many balls as possible while avoiding the obstacles.

name: Among Us
desc: Among Us is a 2018 online multiplayer action social deduction game developed and published by American game studio Innersloth.

name: Astray
desc: Astray

name: Awesome tanks 2
desc: Awesome Tanks 2 is a tank game where you battle against other tanks in a 2D arena. Fire your cannons to tear down enemy tanks!

name: Archery World Tour
desc: Archery World Tour is a campaign based shooter game where you take on the world with nothing but your bow and aim.

name: Alien Hominid
desc: Take over as the titular hominid, who has to fend off waves of secret agents.

name: Axis Football League
desc: is a fun and fast-paced American Football game in which you can compete in various football matches and leagues.

name: Basketball stars
desc: Basketball Stars is the ultimate basketball/sports game where you can play as Lebron James, Stephen Curry, Derrick Williams, and more, created by Madpuffers.

name: Basketbros.io
desc: BasketBros is a side-scrolling basketball game in which you compete against formidable opponents.

name: Basket Random
desc: Basketball is here with its most funny and random way. In Basket Random game, try to score a basket by using only one key with different variations from each other!

name: Big Tower Tiny Square
desc: In this platformer, jump over pits of lava and dodge dangerous traps to reach the top of the tower and rescue your stolen pineapple.

name: BitLife
desc: BitLife is a single player life simulation game in which users make decisions based on a series of multiple choice questions. Try to survive as long as you can!

name: Bloons TD2
desc: Bloons Tower Defense 2 is a popular tower defense game originally released in Flash by Ninja Kiwi.

name: Bloons TD4
desc: Bloons Tower Defense 4 is a popular tower defense game originally released in Flash by Ninja Kiwi.

name: Black Hole Square
desc: Clean up all the other squares in the universe, just tap them and see what happens.

name: Bounce Back
desc:
When life gets you down, it's never too late to...
- B O U N C E B A C K -
action

name: Bob The Robber 2
desc: Enter locations around the town and loot them, picking locks, avoiding traps, lasers, and guards in this cute action adventure.

name: BreakLock
desc: Silly HTML5 game, mobile first. BreakLock is a hybrid of Mastermind and the Android pattern lock. A game you gonna love to hate.

name: Bumpy Ball
desc: BumpyBall.io is a fast-paced action/sports multiplayer car soccer game! Join the league and score as many goals as you can with your rocket powered football cars!

name: Breaking the Bank
desc: In this fast-paced game, players take on the role of a bank robber trying to break the bank and escape with as much money as possible.

name: Chess
desc: Chess is a board game for two players, called White and Black, each controlling an army of chess pieces, with the objective to checkmate the opponent's king

name: Chrome Dino
desc: Google Chrome's unblocked offline game when there is no access to the internet. Press the spacebar to start.

name: Chrome Dino (Modded)
desc: Essentially the chrome dino game but better. Tags: action, mods, dino game

name: Climb Racing 3D
desc: Characters, cars and maps are waiting for you in the car racing game full of fun and adventure with colorful visual effects.

name: Cookie Clicker
desc: Cookie Clicker is an incremental web-browser game developed by Orteil. The goal of the game is to produce as many cookies as possible.

name: Cubes 2048
desc: Cubes 2048.io is an addictive online game that fuses Snake and 2048.

name: Crossy Road
desc: Crossy Road is a retro-arcade-styled game in which the player controls a chicken and a seemingly endless range of animals, in order to get across a busy road.

name: Cut the Rope
desc: Cut the Rope is a physics-based puzzle game. The game revolves around feeding a creature named Om Nom with candy by cutting ropes in a certain manner.

name: Dante
desc: Collect souls in this platformer set in hell.

name: Defly.io
desc: Defly.io Is a multiplayer shooting game, you are a helicopter and can build, shoot, and upgrade your abilities, yo must cover the whole mape with your builds and rule over the land.

name: Dig This
desc: Grab your hard hats and ready your shovels for hours and hours of playing in the dirt. Addictive digging game play made possible thanks to the innovative, realistic dirt and gravity physics.

name: Drift Hunters
desc: Drift Hunters is an awesome 3D car driving game in which you score points by drifting various cars. These points earn you money, that you can spend to upgrade your current car or buy a new one. The game stands out because of its realistic drifting physics and its various driving environments.

name: Duck Life 3
desc: Duck Life 3 is a racing game featuring genetically modified ducks. Choose from one of four duck breeds and evolve as you complete each league.

name: Duck Life 4
desc: Take on the role of a duck racing champion, competing in races and training to become the ultimate duck athlete.

name: Dogeminer
desc: Dogeminer is a lighthearted and addictive game where you play as a dog mining for coins. With simple gameplay and cute graphics, it's easy to get hooked on digging for digital treasures!

name: Dogeminer 2
desc: Build such mining operation, get much dogecoins. Hire many help to increase dogecoin per second. Buy Space Rockets to reach the moon and beyond.

name: Drive Mad

name: Doodle Jump

desc: Fireboy and Watergirl are exploring the Forest Temple in search of diamonds.

name: Flappy Bird

name: Fruit Ninja

name: Geometry Dash
desc: Jump and fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action platformer! Prepare for a near impossible challenge in the world of Geometry Dash.

desc: This is a chaotic two-player game where you race three others to the extraction point. You can only move by jumping left or right.

name: GTA 6
